title: Material-Support-for-Vulnerable-Groups
details: In addition to our sponsorship efforts, KCCBSSA provides annual material support to destitute women, elders, and school children. This initiative includes the distribution of essential items such as blankets and bed sheets for elders, as well as exercise books and school supplies for children from low-income families. By addressing the basic needs of these vulnerable groups, we aim to enhance their quality of life and support their educational journeys.
